downloadTitle: Total Economic Impact of Microsoft Edge: Forrester Survey Infographic
downloadDescription: This infographic provides information to help you evaluate the potential impact of using Microsoft Edge in a large organization.

detailsSection: Forrester surveyed 168 customers using Microsoft Edge from the US, Germany, UK, and Japan, ranging in size from 500 to over 100,000 employees. This document is an abridged version of this survey commissioned by Microsoft and delivered by Forrester Consulting.

systemRequirementsSection: This image is available in PDF and PNG formats. To access the PDF. you will need Adobe Reader or a compatible PDF reader.
installInstructionSection: Click the Download button next to the file format of your choice and open it directly or save it to your local machine for future reference.
